Text:
Don't you think it's time you grew out of this shit?
Your story of Jesus (if he existed, his name was actually Joshua as the name "Jesus" didn't exist in 1st C. Palestine) is plagiarized wholesale from the legend of Mithras- among others. Get a life, and leave your imaginary friend behind!
You stick with Bonzo and I will stick with Jesus. You have been deceived.
